Культовая игра!!!
Легендарная игра с потрясающим сюжетом, олдовой механикой и непередаваемым стилем. Переигрываю очередной раз спустя многолет
dobra fabuła, co innego powiedzieć. Mimo to szkoda że nie mozna zmienic niektorych rzeczy jak juz wie sie co ma sie wydarzyć.
Эта игра покорила многие сердца, и моё не обошла

Un clásico. La segunda parte de la pionera saga de Half Life, pionero en el uso de físicas in-game, con buen aprovechamiento de las mismas en puzzles y en el game play. 
Por su valor como "clasico" vale la pena, tambien es ideal para pasar el rato y disfrutarlo 
100/100
what can I say its half life 2
갓겜
good good

Of course I would. This is one the greats. DOOM hit us with 1st person shooters no doubt and was great in that role. But Half life 2 is a story, not only that, it hits us with great gameplay and a story that is not only believable, but plausible in our near alternate dystopian future. There are many great games out there. But I have'nt run into one that has all of the elements that HL2 has. Of all the games I've played, I will always come back to this one.

For a game that came out in 2004 it looks spectacular. It plays out really well and has a great story. Plus the fact you get to drive vehicles is amazing. It has some awesome gameplay and really fun guns to play around with. It pretty much improved the first half life by a lot. All in all this is a great game and may be one of my favorites of all time
amazing!!!!!!!highly recommend it

Отличная игра
nice
The Best Game Ever !

Half-Life 2 blends original ideas with sci-fi homages in a polished product built on groundbreaking technology.

It hit hard, and aged well, as I appreciate what it is and what it did more and more over the years.

The quality of the game is so high and so polished that the labour involved clearly wasn't done just for profit. They made a work of art, and they did it with an incredible level of competence and effort.

This game has set the standard in first person shooters the story line is deep the mechanics are unique and all other FPS fall short to the quality of this game.
10/10
greatest game ever

Rating ★★★★★

I though this game was a joke and not that great in the long run but i must say it took me by a thunderstorm with a hurricane. The story the game is trying to tell you is absolutely AMAZING and FANTASTIC! It's probably the best single player game i've played in a long time and bought this for only 0,81€. If you buy the game when it's not on sale do it anyway the story is THAT GOOD!
